data.name: App_DataDictionary_procSetDatabaseConstraintColumn_Insert_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
Declare @CatalogId UniqueIdentifier = NewId(), @ModelId UniqueIdentifier = null, @Server SysName = @@ServerName, @Catalog [App_DataDictionary].[typeDatabaseCatalog], @Schema [App_DataDictionary].[typeDatabaseSchema], @Domain [App_DataDictionary].[typeDatabaseDomain], @Table [App_DataDictionary].[typeDatabaseTable], @Column [App_DataDictionary].[typeDatabaseTableColumn], @Constraint [App_DataDictionary].[typeDatabaseConstraint], @ConstraintColumn [App_DataDictionary].[typeDatabaseConstraintColumn]
Insert Into @Catalog Select @CatalogId As [CatalogId], Db_Name() As [CatalogTitle], Convert(NvarChar,Null) As [CatalogDescription], 'Database' As [ScopeName], @Server As [SourceServerName], Db_Name() As [SourceDatabaseName], GetDate() As [SourceDate]
Insert Into @Schema Select @CatalogId As [CatalogId], [CATALOG_NAME] As [DatabaseName], [SCHEMA_NAME] As [SchemaName], 'Database.Schema' As [ScopeName] From [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[SCHEMATA]
Insert Into @Table Select @CatalogId As [CatalogId], I.[TABLE_CATALOG] As [DatabaseName], I.[TABLE_SCHEMA] As [SchemaName], I.[TABLE_NAME] As [TableName], Case When I.[TABLE_TYPE] In ('BASE TABLE') Then 'Database.Schema.Table' When I.[TABLE_TYPE] In ('VIEW') Then 'Database.Schema.View' Else 'ERROR' End [ScopeName], Case When H.[object_id] is Not Null Then 'HISTORY TABLE' When T.[history_table_id] is Not Null Then 'TEMPORAL TABLE' Else I.[TABLE_TYPE] End As [TableType] From [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[TABLES] I Left Join [sys].[Tables] T On I.[TABLE_SCHEMA] = Object_Schema_Name(T.[object_id]) And I.[TABLE_NAME] = Object_Name(T.[object_id]) Left Join [sys].[Tables] H On I.[TABLE_SCHEMA] = Object_Schema_Name(H.[history_table_id]) And I.[TABLE_NAME] = Object_Name(H.[history_table_id])
Insert Into @Column Select @CatalogId As [CatalogId], I.[TABLE_CATALOG] As [DatabaseName], I.[TABLE_SCHEMA] As [SchemaName], I.[TABLE_NAME] As [TableName], I.[COLUMN_NAME] As [ColumnName], Case When T.[TABLE_TYPE] In ('BASE TABLE') Then 'Database.Schema.Table.Column' When T.[TABLE_TYPE] In ('VIEW') Then 'Database.Schema.View.Column' Else 'ERROR' End [ScopeName], I.[ORDINAL_POSITION] As [OrdinalPosition], iif(I.[IS_NULLABLE] In ('YES','TRUE','1'),1,0) As [IsNullable], I.[DATA_TYPE] As [DataType], I.[COLUMN_DEFAULT] As [ColumnDefault], I.[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH] As [CharacterMaximumLength], I.[CHARACTER_OCTET_LENGTH] As [CharacterOctetLength], I.[NUMERIC_PRECISION] As [NumericPrecision], I.[NUMERIC_PRECISION_RADIX] As [NumericPrecisionRadix], I.[NUMERIC_SCALE] As [NumericScale], I.[DATETIME_PRECISION] As [DateTimePrecision], I.[CHARACTER_SET_CATALOG] As [CharacterSetCatalog], I.[CHARACTER_SET_SCHEMA] As [CharacterSetSchema], I.[CHARACTER_SET_NAME] As [CharacterSetName], I.[COLLATION_CATALOG] As [CollationCatalog], I.[COLLATION_SCHEMA] As [CollationSchema], I.[COLLATION_NAME] As [CollationName], I.[DOMAIN_CATALOG] As [DomainCatalog], I.[DOMAIN_SCHEMA] As [DomainSchema], I.[DOMAIN_NAME] As [DomainName], C.[is_identity] As [IsIdentity], C.[is_hidden] As [IsHidden], C.[is_computed] As [IsComputed], P.[definition] As [ComputedDefinition], NullIf(C.[generated_always_type_desc],'NOT_APPLICABLE') As [GeneratedAlwayType] From [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[COLUMNS] I Left Join [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[TABLES] T On I.[TABLE_CATALOG] = T.[TABLE_CATALOG] And I.[TABLE_SCHEMA] = T.[TABLE_SCHEMA] And I.[TABLE_NAME] = T.[TABLE_NAME] Left Join [sys].[Columns] C On I.[TABLE_SCHEMA] = Object_Schema_Name(C.[object_id]) And I.[TABLE_NAME] = Object_Name(C.[object_id]) And I.[COLUMN_NAME] = C.[name] Left Join [sys].[computed_columns] P On C.[object_id] = P.[object_id] And C.[column_id] = P.[column_id]
Insert Into @Constraint Select @CatalogId As [CatalogId], [CONSTRAINT_CATALOG] As [DatabaseName], [CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA] As [SchemaName], [CONSTRAINT_NAME] As [ConstraintName], [TABLE_NAME] As [TableName], 'Database.Schema.Table.Constraint' As [ScopeName], [CONSTRAINT_TYPE] As [ConstraintType] From [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[TABLE_CONSTRAINTS]
Insert Into @ConstraintColumn Select @CatalogId As [CatalogId], T.[CONSTRAINT_CATALOG] As [DatabaseName], T.[CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA] As [SchemaName], T.[CONSTRAINT_NAME] As [ConstraintName], C.[TABLE_NAME] As [TableName], C.[COLUMN_NAME] As [ColumnName], C.[ORDINAL_POSITION] As [OrdinalPosition], F.[TABLE_SCHEMA] As [ReferenceSchemaName], F.[TABLE_NAME] As [ReferenceTableName], F.[COLUMN_NAME] As [ReferenceColumnName] From [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[TABLE_CONSTRAINTS] T Inner Join [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[KEY_COLUMN_USAGE] C On T.[CONSTRAINT_CATALOG] = C.[CONSTRAINT_CATALOG] And T.[CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA] = C.[CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA] And T.[CONSTRAINT_NAME] = C.[CONSTRAINT_NAME] Left Join [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[REFERENTIAL_CONSTRAINTS] R On T.[CONSTRAINT_CATALOG] = R.[CONSTRAINT_CATALOG] And T.[CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA] = R.[CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA] And T.[CONSTRAINT_NAME] = R.[CONSTRAINT_NAME] Left Join [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[KEY_COLUMN_USAGE] F On R.[UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_CATALOG] = F.[CONSTRAINT_CATALOG] And R.[UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA] = F.[CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA] And R.[UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT_NAME] = F.[CONSTRAINT_NAME] And C.[ORDINAL_POSITION] = F.[ORDINAL_POSITION]
Begin Try; Begin Transaction; Set NoCount On;
Exec [App_DataDictionary].[procSetDatabaseCatalog] @ModelId, @CatalogId, @Catalog Exec [App_DataDictionary].[procSetDatabaseSchema] @ModelId, @CatalogId, @Schema Exec [App_DataDictionary].[procSetDatabaseTable] @ModelId, @CatalogId, @Table Exec [App_DataDictionary].[procSetDatabaseTableColumn] @ModelId, @CatalogId, @Column Exec [App_DataDictionary].[procSetDatabaseConstraint] @ModelId, @CatalogId, @Constraint Exec [App_DataDictionary].[procSetDatabaseConstraintColumn] @ModelId, @CatalogId, @ConstraintColumn
Select P.*, D.* From [App_DataDictionary].[DatabaseConstraintColumn] D Inner Join [App_DataDictionary].[DatabaseConstraint] P On D.[ConstraintId] = P.[ConstraintId] Inner Join [App_DataDictionary].[DatabaseConstraintColumn_AK] A On D.[ConstraintColumnId] = A.[ConstraintColumnId] Where A.[CatalogId] = @CatalogId
Print 'Transaction Success, Rollback Issued'; Rollback Transaction; End Try Begin Catch Print 'Rollback Issued'; Rollback Transaction; Throw; End Catch;
